metadata.title: CVE-2019-10171 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: It was found that the fix for CVE-2018-14648 in 389-ds-base, versions1.4.0.x before 1.4.0.17, was incorrectly applied in RHEL 7.5. An attackerwould still be able to provoke excessive CPU consumption leading to adenial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
